text.div:
Rabies (Tests for rabies virus Antibody in CSF)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    6522-7 Rabies virus Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    6523-5 Rabies virus Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Neutralization test
    70856-0 Rabies virus Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    70857-8 Rabies virus Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunoassay
    70859-4 Rabies virus Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Neutralization test
    70860-2 Rabies virus IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    70861-0 Rabies virus IgG Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    70862-8 Rabies virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
    70865-1 Rabies virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immunofluorescence
